pages.text: $(li)The Thief's Hood has the Stealth effect, making it harder for other creatures to detect you.$(br)$(li)This effect can be upgraded by slaying other creatures.$(br)$(li)It can only be found inside of $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) over the Overworld.

pages.title: Stealth Levels
pages.text: $(li)Level 1   +0.15 Stealth$(br)   0/10 - Creatures Slain$(br)$(li)Level 2   +0.3 Stealth$(br)   10/50 - Creatures Slain$(br)$(li)Level 3   +0.45 Stealth$(br)   50/100 - Creatures Slain$(br)$(li)Level 4   +0.6 Stealth$(br)   100/500 - Creatures Slain$(br)$(li)Level 5   +0.75 Stealth$(br)   500/500 - Creatures Slain
